Name: The Asafo Journey
About the game: The Pharaoh has called upon you to help save Egypt. Become Asafo in this action adventure platformer. Every kingdom needs a hero and every hero needs a challenge so become the one and join the journey, become Asafo and challenge the corrupted beasts that reside within the harshest desert sands, to the depths of the Nile river and the highest of the mountain tops. Discover and explore the hidden dungeons and tombs to find hidden treasures but watch out for their guardians and traps. Rise to the challenge and master your skills in combat, agility and hone your mind to become the ultimate warrior.
